g.id, g.product_id, g.shop_id, g.sale_start_time, g.sale_end_time, g.is_deposit, g.deposit_percent, g.user_id, g.create_time, g.is_delete, g.is_use,g.order_num, CASE WHEN g.is_use = -1 THEN -2 WHEN g.sale_start_time > now() AND g.sale_end_time > now() THEN 0 WHEN g.sale_start_time <= now() AND now() < g.sale_end_time THEN 1 WHEN g.sale_start_time < now() AND g.sale_end_time <= now() THEN -1 END STATUS, p.pro_name AS proName,p.two_code_path AS twoCodePath
mapper.select:
select count(p.id) from t_mall_presale p where p.is_delete = 0
and g.is_use = -1
and p.sale_start_time > now() and p.sale_end_time > now()
and p.sale_start_time <= now() and now() < p.sale_end_time
and p.sale_start_time < now() and p.sale_end_time <= now()
and p.shop_id =#{shopId}
and
p.shop_id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT
from t_mall_presale g left join t_mall_presale_deposit d on d.presale_id=g.id WHERE g.is_delete = 0 and g.is_use =1
and g.product_id = #{productId}
and ((g.sale_start_time <= now() and now() < g.sale_end_time ) or ( g.sale_start_time > now() and g.sale_end_time > now()) ) and d.deposit_status != -1

SELECT b.id, b.product_id, b.shop_id, b.sale_start_time, b.sale_end_time, b.is_deposit, b.deposit_percent, b.user_id, b.create_time, b.is_delete, b.is_use, b.order_num, c.image_url AS imageUrl, e.specifica_img_url AS specImageUrl, p.is_specifica AS isSpecifica, p.pro_name AS proName, IF (p.is_specifica = 0, p.pro_price, d.inv_price) AS proPrice, p.pro_stock_total AS proStockTotal FROM t_mall_presale b LEFT JOIN t_mall_product p ON b.product_id = p.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ass_id, image_url FROM t_mall_image_associative WHERE ass_type=1 AND is_delete=0 AND is_main_images=1) c ON b.product_id=c.ass_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, specifica_img_id, inv_num, inv_price, id FROM t_mall_product_inventory WHERE is_default=1 AND is_delete=0) D ON b.product_id= D.product_id LEFT JOIN t_mall_product_specifica e ON D.specifica_img_id=e.id WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT count(o.id) AS count FROM t_mall_presale p LEFT JOIN t_mall_order o ON p.id = o.group_buy_id AND o.order_type = 5 WHERE o.buyer_user_id = #{joinUserId} AND p.id = #{presaleId} AND o.order_status > 1 AND o.order_status < 5

select
from t_mall_presale g where g.sale_start_time < now() and g.sale_end_time <= now() or (g.is_delete = 1 or g.is_use = -1)

SELECT count(mp.product_id) FROM t_mall_presale mp LEFT JOIN t_mall_product a ON a.id=mp.product_id WHERE a.shop_id=#{shopId} AND a.is_publish=1 AND a.check_status=1 AND a.is_delete=0 AND ((mp.sale_start_time > NOW() AND mp.sale_end_time > NOW() ) OR (mp.sale_start_time <= NOW() AND NOW() < mp.sale_end_time)) AND mp.is_use=1 AND mp.is_delete=0
and a.pro_name like '%${searchName}%'
